title: klien_br

content: Selling a legendary account with email & private keys.Bid starts : $250Drop your telegram for further conversation.

comments.author: zestVI
comments.body: is this allowed?what if admins block the account?do i get the money back?

comments.author: klien_br
comments.body: Quote from: zestVI on October 14, 2022, 05:58:46 PMis this allowed?what if admins block the account?do i get the money back?It is not allowed but is not banned as well. Admins would not notice that you've bought the account so the account would be safe.
